summary: This adds a player home near Darkwater Crossing
descriptionHtml:
This is my first attempt at modding anything for Skyrim.

The mod adds a player home near Darkwater Crossing, an enchanted dagger, and a lightly armored enchanted circlet.

The mini-quest is completed! While inside the cave look around and make sure to search and loot anything you find. The entrance to the mini-quest can be found on the other side of the rock formation near the cabin (pictures for detailed directions). I\'ve left version 02.5, with the key located on a rock at Darkwater Crossing, in case you wanted an easy one story cabin. I have, however, added a basement with an enchantment table and an alchemy lab with version 03.

Let me know if the dagger\'s enchantment doesn\'t work correctly or if you think a different enchantment would be good for the circlet.


--------------------------------------------
Version 03.5: I added a map marker for the cabin (that was pretty easy).

Version 03: The same as 02.5 but the key is now acquired through a mini-quest near the cabin.

Version 02.5: I had added a tent at the pond near CradleCrush Rock. 02.5 doesn\'t have the tent, otherwise it\'s exactly the same as 02.

Version 02: Made it follower friendly, I think...

Version 01: Initial Release





Plans: Learn to use more of the Creation Kit.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The screenshots show a dagger and an axe you may not recognize, they are from \'JaySuS Swords\' by jaysus

Find it here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1002


--------------------------------------------------------------

Check out my customized weapon set:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17274



___________________________________________

A thank you to the plethora of tutorial videos on YouTube.
author: SlipTrick
